content: ***this is for a digital download of the crochet pattern to make the grandma s german shells shawl yourself not the finished product **** please note- this pattern is written in english american english in american crochet terms this pattern does not have a chart this gorgeous lacy shawl is designed using the german shells or virus stitch and a block or granny stitch groups of double crochets it is lovely in many different colors and grows a lot like a granny square this shawls finished size is 93 inches across straight edge by 49 inches from middle to tip you can make this shawl bigger by just continuing with the repeats there is a gauge pattern included with this pattern for yarn and hook comparisons but size numbers may differ for each individual materials needed 1700 yards of red heart super saver ombre or any worsted weight yarn used g 4 25 mm hook scissors level of difficulty intermediate* *if you know how to single_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch chain and read basic crochet patterns you can do this this pattern has a few photos for referencing also i am always around for questions so feel free to message me here please make sure to read all of the pattern including special notes
